verses.verse: {The Lord is Holy} d The Lord reigns let people tremble; he is seated above the cherubim let the earth quake.
The Lord is great in Zion and is exalted above all peoples.
Let them praise your great and awesome name. He is holy!
A mighty king who loves justice, you have established fairness. You have exercised justice and righteousness over Jacob.
Exalt the Lord our God; worship and bow down at his footstool; He is holy!
Moses and Aaron were among his priests; Samuel also was among those who invoked his name. When they called on the Lord , he answered them.
In a pillar of cloud he spoke to them; they obeyed his decrees and the Law that he gave them.
Lord our God, you answered them; you were their God who forgave {Lit. carried} them, but also avenged their evil deeds.
Exalt the Lord our God and worship at his holy mountain, for the Lord our God is holy!
